revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Contest Champion (Johanna).png|30px]]Contest Champion || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Twinleaf Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Mesprit}}. |- | [[File:Professor Rowan.png|30px]]Professor Rowan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Beachcomber || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Manaphy}}. |- | [[File:Aroma Lady.png|30px]]Flower Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Floaroma Town]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Location-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Eevee}} into {{Pokemon|Leafeon}}. |- | [[File:Lass.png|30px]]Lass Caroline || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Eterna City]] || Informs the player about the [[Old Chateau|location]] and [[Dungeons#Sinnoh|requirement]] for {{Pokemon|Rotom}} and its forms. |- | [[File:Worker.png|30px]]Construction Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Oreburgh City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Nosepass}} into {{Pokemon|Probopass}}. |- | Contest Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Magneton}} into {{Pokemon|Magnezone}}. |- | Pal Park Warden || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pal Park]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Cherrim (Overcast)}} into {{Pokemon|Cherrim (Sunshine)}}. |- | [[File:Burglar.png|30px]] Burglar || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalve City]] || Tells the player the why the Razor [[Evolution Items]] don't work during the Day. |- | [[File:Riley.png|30px]]Riley || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the requirement to evolve {{Pokemon|Riolu}}. |- | Young Boy || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Cresselia}}. |- | Young Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Snowpoint City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Eevee}} into {{Pokemon|Glaceon}}. |- | [[File:Beauty (trainer).png|30px]]Ribboner Julia || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sunyshore City]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Level-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Piloswine}} into {{Pokemon|Mamoswine}}. |- | [[File:Ace Trainer (male).png|30px]]Ace Trainer Quinn || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Fight Area]] || Informs the player about the requirement to unlock [[Distortion World]]. |- | [[File:Hiker.png|30px]]Hiker Kevin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Survival Area]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
